0100010101110010 0101001000011111 1 -> sum: 1001011110010010, cout: 0
1011000001101110 1010000011010010 1 -> sum: 0101000101000001, cout: 1
1000000011101110 0100001101101111 0 -> sum: 1100010001011101, cout: 0
0110110111101001 1110110010010110 1 -> sum: 0101101010000000, cout: 1
1001011001011110 1101100001001100 1 -> sum: 0110111010101011, cout: 1
0001001110010111 0101001100011001 0 -> sum: 0110011010110000, cout: 0
